Body: I have Locked myself out of my phone because I entered too many pattern attempts. I can't sign into my Google account because my wi-fi isn't turned on. So I need to factory reset it. I'm just wondering what will I lose. My photos and videos are saved onto my phone, will I lose them?If there are any other options in getting back into my without factory resetting it, it would be greatly appreciated.ThanksBy the way I have a Samsung Galaxy Xcover
Title: What will I lose when I do a factory reset?
